name: paulownia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an Asian tree that has large, heart-shaped leaves: We cut back the paulownias every year so that they produce much larger leaves. The farm contains several paulownia groves. It will be the first time hybrid Paulownia trees, which can absorb 10 times as much carbon as native forests, will be planted in Britain.
[ U ] the wood of the paulownia tree, used to make furniture and musical instruments, and in building : They make furniture and other objects from walnut, oak, cherry, paulownia, ash, and poplar. He showed me a little box made of paulownia wood.
